def-en: In the context of machine learning, the task of predicting which distinct entities in a dataset actually stand for the same concept or object.
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs ríomhfhoghlama, tasc a bhfuil i gceist aige réamhinsint a dhéanamh ar cén aonaid ar leith i dtacar sonraí atá dáiríre ag seasamh don choincheap nó don réad céanna.
